summary: This bill, the "Shivwits Band of Paiutes Jurisdictional Clarity Act," aims to clarify jurisdictional authority over civil cases involving the Shivwits Band of Paiutes in Utah. It grants the State of Utah jurisdiction over civil actions arising on or within the tribe's Indian lands. It also addresses federal court jurisdiction concerning contracts or agreements on these lands and specifies that the bill doesn't waive the tribe's sovereign immunity. Finally, it amends an existing law regarding leasing authority for tribal lands.
